camera_gear.model: Phase One XF IQ4 150MP / Hasselblad H6D-100c / Canon EOS R5
camera_gear.lens: Tilt-Shift Wide-Angle TS-E 24mm f/3.5L II / PC-E Nikkor 24mm f/3.5D ED
camera_gear.sensor: Medium Format 150MP BSI CMOS / Full-frame 45MP stacked sensor

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Civil Twilight (20-30 minutes after sunset, blue hour, when the sky remains clear and blue)
lighting_setup.weather: Clear sky with high atmospheric transparency
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Residual top skylight from zenith  mixed with warm base-up landscape lighting
lighting_setup.quality: High-key soft ambient light with multi-layer artificial illumination
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Integrated landscape lighting system: ground-recessed LED uplights (3000K) illuminating tree canopies, linear LED cove lighting (2700K) under trees, dark amber interior office lights glowing through glass at low floor

color_grading.palette: Split-tone with cyan-blue sky (4500K) contrasting against dark amber landscape lighting (3000K)
color_grading.saturation: Low saturation with enhanced vibrancy in sky blues and landscape greens, warm tones intensified in lighting fixtures, low saturation shadow area
color_grading.contrast: Medium contrast with lifted shadows, reduced contrast ratio between interior and exterior, smooth tonal transitions

texture_quality.details: Ultra-sharp architectural details capturing glass reflections, individual leaves on illuminated trees, and warm glow gradients on bench surfaces, clear visibility of interior furniture through glass
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Low-iron reflective glazing mirroring sky gradient, warm-toned stone, smooth paving stones reflecting ambient light

composition_guide.type: Symmetrical one-point perspective, eye-level camera height

atmosphere.feeling: Airy, prosperous, technologically advanced yet naturally integrated, inviting communal space

technical_quality.post_processing: Perspective correction for perfect vertical alignment of buildings, clarity enhancement on architectural lines, highlight control on glazing reflections
technical_quality.white_balance: Dual white balance: exterior balanced to 4000K for clean blue sky, artificial lighting allowed warm rendering at 3000K creating natural color contrast
technical_quality.tone: High-tone dominant (Dark grey values), avoiding crushed blacks
technical_quality.dynamic_range: Standard dynamic range with emphasis on preserving texture in highlight area
